articles.content: The Los Angeles Dodgers (64-46) close out a 4-game series against the San Diego Padres (55-57) on Monday. First pitch from Petco Park is at 4:10 p.m. ET (MLB Network). Let’s analyze BetMGM Sportsbook… [+3861 chars]
